Articles.Content: I’ve been playing KSP on PS5 and love everything about the game, I wanna build a mothership/space station, I have docked a number of times and never came across any issues, until I tried to build something huge in space. I sent a big rocket to orbit with 7 docking ports, 4 of which are for me to dock boosters on it. After I docked the ship/ booster to the rocket I didn’t understand why I couldn’t rotate it into place in the same way I saw people online. Is there a solution to this or is that feature only for PC cause of mods. If so will it ever come to KSP on PS5?

Sorry, what was it you were trying to rotate? 

Also, welcome to the forum.

Do you mean rotate the dock?  I know there was an issue with that new functionality and can't remember the resolution or if there was a workaround.  I disable/lock the stock dock rotation and use the DockRotate mod in its place because of that bug.  I think it was mentioned the bug will likely not be fully addressed in KSP1 as nearly all effort is going into KSP2 now
